content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.

content: I'm a student, so I'm looking for a price that's fair and within my budget. I'm smart and responsible, so I'm not easily tricked. content: Emilia, I appreciate your honesty and commitment to fairness. As a landlord, I understand the importance of finding a balance that works for both parties. content: Thank you for your willingness to work with me, Mister Schmidt. Based on my budget and the location of the apartment, I believe a fair price would be around 650 Euro per month. content: I appreciate your flexibility, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking to rent the apartment for at least one year, with the possibility of extending the lease if both parties are agreeable.
